hero.description:
Hello! I'm Juan Camilo Zu√±iga, a Systems Engineering student from Colombia, advancing in my degree at the University of Magdalena in Santa Marta.
With a strong focus on backend web development, I specialize in server-side programming using statically typed languages, complemented by solid skills in frontend development. I have over three years of experience working with languages like Java, C#, Python, and TypeScript, alongside technologies like Spring Boot and ASP.NET Core.
I'm deeply passionate about open-source contributions and continually expanding my expertise in the field.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Developing powerful, secure, and scalable server-side applications using C#, Java, Kotlin, and Typescript to support seamless data processing and user experiences.

database.title: Database Design
database.description: Architecting efficient, scalable, and optimized SQL database structures to ensure fast, reliable data storage and retrieval across applications.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creating dynamic, responsive, and visually engaging user interfaces focused on usability and cross-platform compatibility.

api.title: API Development
api.description: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs and microservices with high reliability, facilitating seamless communication across systems.

backendPrototype.title: Backend Prototypes Design
backendPrototype.description: Creating innovative backend prototypes to test and validate business logic and architecture for MVP server-side applications.

webAssembly.title: Web Assembly Development
webAssembly.description: Building high-performance, cross-platform modules with WebAssembly, enabling faster, near-native performance in web applications.

prototypeDesign.title: Prototypes Design
prototypeDesign.description: Designing digital prototypes to model and simulate systems and interfaces, enhancing user experience and usability.

multiplatformMobile.title: Multiplatform Mobile Development
multiplatformMobile.description: Developing mobile applications that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android, maximizing reach and user engagement.

multiplatformDesktop.title: Multiplatform Desktop Development
multiplatformDesktop.description: Creating cross-platform desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux, ensuring accessibility across various devices.

mobile.title: Native Mobile Development
mobile.description: Building high-performance native applications for Android and iOS, utilizing platform-specific features to enhance user experience.

noSQL.title: NoSQL Databases Design
noSQL.description: Designing NoSQL databases optimized for scalable, flexible data models that meet modern application demands.
